text: @TexasTribune @PattyHawbaker @GovAbbott BREAKING NEWS: In a statement released today #Covid19 said  it loves Texas, "Abbott is so dumb and he's giving me plenty a room to roam, do my killing and move on to the next Texan.  I love it here and I ain't leaving anytime soon."
